sqlMap.insert: insert into member_space (smember_id, smember_name, smember_email, smember_pass, smember_phone) values ('SM'||lpad (seq_SM.nextval,3,0),#smember_name#, #smember_email# ,#smember_pass#,#smember_phone#)
sqlMap.select: select smember_id, smember_name, smember_email, smember_pass, smember_phone from member_space where smember_id=#smember_id#
select smember_id, smember_name, smember_email, smember_pass, smember_phone from member_space
select count(smember_pass) from member_space where smember_email=#smember_email#
